availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: New Castle, Henry County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Town of New Castle, p. 8.

Find A Grave, Entry for Berry Ellis (1804-1878), Find A Grave Memorial # 28362515, New Castle Cemetery, New Castle, Henry County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=ellis&GSfn=berry&GSbyrel=all&GSdy=1878&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=28362515&df=all& (accessed 27 May 2017).
